name: Industrial Lantern
content:
Industrial Lantern

A massive industrial complex centered around a towering beacon of light. Primary Objectives are power nodes. Secondary markers are control stations or maintenance access points. The constant glow of the lantern casts long shadows across the battlefield.


Terrain Features:

  • Power nodes
  • Control stations
  • Maintenance access points
  • Industrial structures

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the hum of machinery and the constant glow of the industrial lantern. Steam hisses from broken pipes, and the ground trembles with the pulse of massive engines.
